title: Budget Committee Calls on United Nations to Boost Investigation into Corruption, Funds Mismanagement in Wake ...
text: ( Source : United Nations General Assembly ) Delegates today called on a United Nations oversight body to boost its capacity to investigate corruption, mismanagement of resources and sexual abuse, as the Fifth Committee ( Administrative and
